item.title: BDJ Dog Nail Grinder with 2 LED Lights Upgraded 3-Speed Electric Recharge Pet Nail Trimmer with Clippers & Files Powerful Painless Paws Grooming & Smoothing for Small Medium Large Dogs & Cats

item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99 - $16.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 06:07:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Components

Pet Nail Grinder * 1 Pet Nail Clippers * 1 Pet Nail File* 1 USB Charging Cable * 1 Cleaning Brush*1 User Manual * 1

Built-in Dual LED Lights & Superior Safety

Super-bright 2 LED lights make you look at the nail location easier. Never worry about over-grinding.The independent LED light switch design allows you to turn on or off it according to different needs.

Upgraded Motor & Diamond Grinding Head

The new version of BDJ dog nail grinders with a powerful motor support heavy grinding. The power boosted by 20% makes fast and effective grinding.Upgraded diamond grinding makes more durable and reusable.

Low Noise Grinder < 50 db,Safer, Faster, Easier.

The upgraded BDJ dog nail grinder uses a superior motor with whisper-quiet technology.The low noise & low vibration makes your pets feel relaxed when grooming. Provide an efficient and comfortable nail grinding experience.

Advanced 3-Speed Switch & Smart LCD

The upgraded LCD design shows the current mode and battery capacity. It is more convenient to use.Adjustable 3-speed (7000-9000 RPM) & 3 grinding ports nail grinder is widely applied to small, medium, large pets, simply choose the appropriate port and speed depending on your pet’s size and nail hardness.

How to Groom Your Pets Nail Safely?

Step 1: Use the pet nail clippers to cut the sharp and too-long nails first.

Step 2: Turn on the grinder and accustom your pet to the sound and smell to avoid scaring it.

Step 3: Put the electric nail grinder around the 45 oblique angles and trim the nails carefully.

Step 4: It’s necessary to treat your pet after every progress. Reward it with its favorite snacks.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 7.24 x 3.46 x 2.36 inches; 6.7 Ounces
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Ion batteries required.
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 14, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ BDJ
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09QG4B94W

[ Advanced 3-Speed Switch & 3 Grinding Ports ] Low-high speed design powerful enough support heavy grinding. 3 ports fit all kinds of pets from small, medium and large pets. Choosing the appropriate port and speed according to the size of your pet’s nails. This truly is the perfect dog cat nail grinder.
[ Upgraded Smart LCD and Built in 2 LED Lights Design ] Allow you see the location of dog’s quick more easily and prevent over-grinding or cutting. Reducing the risk of hurting your pet or clipping the claws too short. Upgraded LCD will show you the current mode and battery capacity. It is more convenient for use.
[ Super Low Noise & Vibration ] High-quality motor makes grinder is ultra-quiet in 3 speed modes. The noise is controlled to 50dB while boosting the torque. Pets stays calm while grinding their nails.
[ Smart OS & Rechargeable Easily ] The powerful and intelligent management system greatly increases the service life of the dog nail grinder. And the USB wire can conveniently connect to a laptop, AC adapter or power bank to charge.

Components

  • Pet Nail Grinder * 1
  • Pet Nail Clippers * 1
  • Pet Nail File* 1
  • USB Charging Cable * 1
  • Cleaning Brush*1
  • User Manual * 1
